name: Breakfast Matching Game
description:
Memory Match Game with your breakfast favorite items!
Tap to flip card, find those with the same item to make them disappear. But Hurry up, because time is ticking.
3 Levels:
- Easy: find matching pairs in a 4x3 board
- Medium: find matching pairs in a 4x4 board
- Hard: find matching pairs in a 5x4 board.
** CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS IN GAME CENTER **
Have fun!!
